scripts.publish:lib: mv "$(npm pack | tail -n 1)" package.tgz && ts-node src/publish/postpack.ts && PUBLIB=true npm publish package.tgz && shx rm -f package.tgz
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run compile:once && npm run test:cov
scripts.build-and-pack: shx rm -f data-channels-builtin-processors.zip && npm run build && npm run pack:zip
scripts.deploy: npm run build-and-pack && cdk deploy --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy-personal: export ENVIRONMENT=$(whoami | tr '.' '-') && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-sfdev: export NODE_CONFIG_ENV=sfdev AWS_PROFILE=sfdev && npm run build-and-pack && cdk deploy --region us-east-1 --toolkit-stack-name ss-cdktoolkit
scripts.deploy-sandbox: export NODE_CONFIG_ENV=sandbox AWS_PROFILE=data-channels-sandbox && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-platsandbox1: export NODE_CONFIG_ENV=platsandbox1 AWS_PROFILE=plat-sandbox && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-ssdev: export NODE_CONFIG_ENV=ssdev AWS_PROFILE=data-channels-dev && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-dev: export NODE_CONFIG_ENV=dev AWS_PROFILE=data-channels-dev && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-navprod: export NODE_CONFIG_ENV=navprod AWS_PROFILE=data-channels-naviance-prod && npm run deploy
